Posts.Content: Jul 27, 2011 02:45PM Arline wrote: I'm very happy without those extra pieces of equipment ............no reconstruction for me!!.  Just bought all kinds of colored,floral padded bras until I am properfly fitted with my prosthesis (plural)!!!!!  I kind of like this clean, flat  look.......................when I hug my hubby, he has more tissue than I do.  He is wonderful about my decision!  I hope anyone who is sharing this experience, finds it as easy to adapt to!
Posts.Title: No reconstruction- Happy w/your decision? marlee1 quietpools
